article_title: Sunak urges restraint after Iran attack on Israel
sentence: The  war  in  Gaza  was  triggered  after  waves  of  Hamas  gunmen  stormed  into  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  more  than  250  hostage.

article_title: Sunak urges restraint after Iran attack on Israel
sentence: Israel  vowed  to  eliminate  Hamas  and  has  launched  retaliatory  operations  in  Gaza  which  have  killed  more  than  33,000  people,  including  thousands  of  children,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
